version.author: BethHarmon
version.changelog: v1.4 Remove original auto_solo script Remove auto_solo functionality from Create source groups script Add custom audition script Audition & Take Record scripts both auto-filter active mixer tracks v1.3 Prepare Takes scripts are now single press Renamed scripts
